title: The "none" lock screen option has disappeared.
content:
I wanted to view a password saved in my google key chain. I don't have a lock on my device normally, so it required I set up a pin. After I was done with the password, I tried to revert back to no lock. However the option had disappeared.

I have tried clearing credentials, removing admin apps, performing a restart.

Anyone faced this issue before?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
